content.question: A. Using the graph, compare the trend lines for the region of Europe and the region of Latin America and the Caribbean for the 1981 to 2016 time period. B. Explain how changes in the rate of natural increase have affected the percent of land used for agriculture in sub-Saharan Africa. C. Explain the degree to which the practice of monoculture in a region can have variable effects on environmental sustainability. D. Using the region of East Asia and the Pacific, explain how technology has increased economies of scale in the agricultural sector.

frqParts.text: A. Using the graph, compare the trend lines for the region of Europe and the region of Latin America and the Caribbean for the 1981 to 2016 time period. B. Explain how changes in the rate of natural increase have affected the percent of land used for agriculture in sub-Saharan Africa. C. Explain the degree to which the practice of monoculture in a region can have variable effects on environmental sustainability. D. Using the region of East Asia and the Pacific, explain how technology has increased economies of scale in the agricultural sector.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Compare patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
